text: The 2012–13 Macedonian Third Football League was the 21st season of the third- tier football league in the Republic of Macedonia, since its establishment. It began on August 2012 and ended on June 2013. ==North== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !width="100px"|Club !width="100px"|City / Town |- | Albarsa / Shkupi | Skopje |- | Alumina | Skopje
